title: The top 5 games of the year
summary: These are the games that have received the most praise from gamers and critics alike. They're not only fun and interesting to play, but they also have great stories and unique gameplay elements. The Last of Us Part 2 is a sequel to the 2013 smash hit “The Last Of Us” and is a single-player game played from a third-person perspective. PlayerUnknown’s Battlegrounds is a fight to the death between 100 players and the goal of the game is to be the last man standing.

We spend lots of time playing them, talking about them with friends and family, thinking about them and even dreaming about them. The games we play also reflect who we are as individuals. They serve as a mirror that reflects back an image of our unique personalities. Each one of us has different preferences and taste in games. There\u2019s also a lot to choose from, too: There are so many video games today that no individual can ever hope to try them all. That said, there are some great ones out there and they come in all shapes and sizes: Action-adventure, shooters, RPGs; you name it! Here is a list of the top 5 games this year that you must play if you haven\u2019t already:"))}MDXContent.isMDXComponent=!0;

Horizon Zero Dawn"),mdx("p",null,"This is one of the only games that lets you play as a badass female lead. It received many praises for its interesting storyline and gameplay, which was inspired by the \u201CThe End of the World\u201D genre. The story takes place in the future and the world is left in ruins by a mysterious machine life form. The humans have been reduced to tribal civilizations living in primitive conditions, while the machines have developed intelligence and are now waging a war against them. Horizon Zero Dawn follows Aloy, a young outcast of a tribal society, who discovers that she\u2019s connected to the machines and is able to destroy them with special arrows. The game is played from a third-person perspective and it\u2019s open-world, which means you can roam freely within the map."),mdx("h2",null,"4. Person 5."),mdx("p",null,"This game is all about your decisions. In fact, they\u2019re the only things that matter in this game. You play as a character named Jax who is a prisoner on a spaceship. The entire game lasts for only 17 minutes and revolves around you trying to escape the ship by hacking into its computer. You can either try to escape by yourself or help a fellow prisoner, nicknamed \u201CEight\u201D, who is also on the ship. The game ends differently and you are given four different outcomes based on what your choice is. It\u2019s a simple game, but one that\u2019s definitely worth checking out for all the hype it had."),mdx("h2",null,"3. nier: automata"),mdx("p",null,"This game has a very interesting story behind it. It was actually a sequel to a game that came out in 2010. Despite the fact that the majority of people didn\u2019t even know about the 2010 game, the sequel was a smash hit. It\u2019s a single-player game and played from a third-person perspective. It revolves around an android army that is fighting an interplanetary war against humanity. You\u2019re an android that has been sent to Earth to find out more about why the army is fighting. The game has a grimdark story and is often described as an RPG with strong elements of the \u201Cshooter\u201D genre."),mdx("h2",null,"2. PlayerUnknown\u2019s Battlegrounds"),mdx("p",null,"This game is the ultimate test of survival. The gameplay is basically a fight to the death between 100 players and it\u2019s played from a first-person perspective. The goal of the game is to be the last man standing. You start off with nothing and have to find weapons, armor and other items to survive. The map is also filled with items that can help you, but only if you find them first. The game is played online with other real-life players, so you need to stay on your toes to survive the other players who are out to get you."),mdx("h2",null,"1. The Last of Us Part 2"),mdx("p",null,"This game is a sequel to the 2013 smash hit \u201CThe Last of Us\u201D, which is widely considered to be one of the greatest games ever made. It\u2019s an action-adventure survival horror played from a third-person perspective. It takes place in a post-apocalyptic world that was ravaged by a fungal pandemic. Joel and Ellie, the main characters of the first game, are back for more action. The game is set several years after the events of the first game and has received critical acclaim from critics and gamers alike."),mdx("h2",null,"Conclusion"),mdx("p",null,"The list of games that we\u2019ve compiled here represents the best of the best. These are the games that have received the most praise from gamers and critics alike. They\u2019re not only fun and interesting to play, but they also have great stories and unique gameplay elements. They\u2019ve been made with great care to detail and are definitely worth checking out."),mdx("p",null,"With so many great games to choose from, it can be tricky to figure out which ones to play first. Ideally, you should try to play as many of these games as you can and try out different genres, too. That way, you won\u2019t just be playing the same game over and over again."))}MDXContent.isMDXComponent=!0;
